lead: Innovative approaches to education are emerging, leveraging technology and AI to enhance learning experiences for children and adults alike.

stories.title: Former Googlers seek to captivate kids with an AI-powered learning app
stories.summary: A trio of former Google employees has launched Sparkli, an AI-driven learning app aimed at engaging children with modern educational concepts. The app focuses on essential skills like design, financial literacy, and entrepreneurship, addressing the gap in traditional education systems. By creating interactive learning experiences, Sparkli hopes to inspire the next generation of learners.
